name: Minimalist Google Music Player
description: Minimalist Google Music Player.  Looks quite good if running as an application shortcut through to Google Chrome browser.  If you have comments or suggestions, feel free to post in the Suggestions discussion below.
additional_info:
Also check out style 77581 and style 83934 if you want a more compact navigation column on the left.

UPDATE 05/06/2015 - Header clean up

UPDATE 04/17/2015 - Clean up Listen Now section and move Genre picker higher.

UPDATE 04/14/2015 - Clean up header, make tweaks to Listen Now headers, and include "Refresh station" button in Queue.

UPDATE 03/17/2015 - Clean up header

UPDATE 01/16/2015 - Clean up header

UPDATE 01/05/2015 - Clean up header

UPDATE 11/25/2014 - Clean up "Playing From" section

UPDATE 11/7/2014 - Add "Save Queue" and "Clear Queue" buttons to Queue header

UPDATE 8/4/2014 - Remove Google+ Share button in header 

UPDATE 7/16/2014 - Cleanup Header. Queue "Playing From" header no longer appears to be displayed but keeping the updates from 5/14/2014 just in case it returns.

UPDATE 6/6/2014 - Cleanup Header

UPDATE 5/14/2014 - Update Queue to make the "Playing From" header shorter and display band information across the album art

UPDATE 4/17/2014 - Cleanup header

UPDATE 3/7/2014 - Cleanup header

UPDATE 1/27/2014 - More cleanup

UPDATE 12/4/2013 - Additional header section cleanup

UPDATE 11/4/2013 - More tweaks to keep the header section clean.

UPDATE 10/25/2013 - Update UI after more changes to header section.

UPDATE 10/3/2013 - Update UI after major changes to header section.

UPDATE 7/31/2013 - Tweak UI after slight changes in header section by Google.

UPDATE 6/24/2013 - Changes to the header color scheme and made the search field rounded.  Tweaked the navigation sidebar. Reduced the size of the shortcuts menu (accessible using 'Shift+?') to make it readable.

UPDATE 5/17/2013 - Update for the complete redesign of Google Music. There are probably some adjustments that can be done to reduce the width of player bar.

UPDATE 5/7/2013 - Update for changes to Google Music site formatting, tweaked the interface with the largest change being the search field now only displays when you hover over it with a mouse.

UPDATE 3/4/2013 - Hopefully clears up the Navigation column margin issues.

UPDATE 2/27/2013 - Quick update for changes to Google Music site formatting

UPDATE 10/5/2012 - Additional tweaks for when Google Play popups for available music. If you use this userstyle, I'm looking for feedback on whether you want these popups to be displayed at all.

discussions.name: Great job but I think there is a lot of room for improvement!
